devdoc.details: Factory contract for creating OpenZeppelin VestingWallet instances

createVestingWalletWithTokens(address,ui.details: Creates a VestingWallet and transfers tokens to it in one transaction

params.amount: the amount of tokens to transfer
params.duration: duration in seconds of the period in which the tokens will vest
params.startTime: the time (as Unix time) at which point vesting begins
params.token: the token to transfer to the vesting wallet (zero address for native token)

returns.vestingWallet: the address of the created VestingWallet

devdoc.title: VestingFactory

createVestingWalletWithTokens(address,ui.notice: When token is address(0), native tokens are sent via msg.value. For ERC20 tokens,          the caller must approve this contract first.
